history.narrative: Law 20-230, the “Guardianship Amendment Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-710. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Dec. 2, 2014, and Dec. 17, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Dec. 30, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-552 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-230 became effective on Mar. 11, 2015.
